--- DateTime : 2023/03/22
--- Description : math 扩展
---

---根据最值 返回值
---@param min number
---@param max number
---@param num number
function math.clamp(min, max, num)
    if min > num then
        return min
    end

    if max < num then
        return max
    end
    
    return num
end
